column4: I have karmic installed on a flash drive.  Is it possible to install it from that to my harddrive (and keep settings and applications) or will I need the CD to do that?
depends on how you 'installed' it to the flash drive
From the live CD I clicked install and then chose the flash drive as my installation drive.
sounds like you did a 'normal' install to the flash drive.  I dont think you can install from that to another location then
